reviewText: i love movies! Everything about them, behind the scenes, how they are made. i love small independent film makers who make movies for the love of making movies! Mark Baranowski loves making movies! i love his work. it aint going to win any academy awards, but you have to start somewhere!  He has made some great horror movies with his Scream Queen wife, Ryli Morgan! Give them a chance!

0 zero stars is the rating I would give this piece of crap. Where to start. No plot, bad acting, stupid dialogue, shot with home video. I wish I could get the $1.99 back. Please, don't waste your hard earned money. Amazon should have a refund policy for crap like this abortion. I feel like I have been mugged for the two bucks in my pocket.
